None.Name: Epidemic
None.Description: Infects an enemy with a parasite that deals 60 damage every seconds. After 10 seconds the parasite passes over to the next available target within a 15m range. May affect a total of 4 targets. The parasite will vanish if no more targets are nearby. Reusable every 20 seconds.
